org.ietf.nea.pb.message

Class PbMessageValueFactoryIetf

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.ietf.nea.pb.message.PbMessageValueFactoryIetf

  • public final class PbMessageValueFactoryIetf
extends Object
    Factory utility to create a IETF RFC 5793 compliant TNCCS message value.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private static long VENDORID 

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Modifier Constructor and Description
      private PbMessageValueFactoryIetf()
      Private constructor should never be invoked.

    • Method Detail

      • createImValue

        public static PbMessageValueIm createImValue(PbMessageImFlagEnum[] imFlags,
                             long subVendorId,
                             long subType,
                             int collectorId,
                             int validatorId,
                             byte[] message)
        Creates a TNCCS message value containing an integrity measurement component message. Uses the given values to address the message.
        Parameters:
        imFlags - the flags to set for the message
        subVendorId - the vendor ID of the component
        subType - the type of the component
        collectorId - the source/destination IM(C) ID
        validatorId - the source/destination IM(V) ID
        message - the serialized integrity measurement component message
        Returns:
        an IETF RFC 5793 compliant TNCCS message value

      • createAccessRecommendationValue

        public static PbMessageValueAccessRecommendation createAccessRecommendationValue(PbMessageAccessRecommendationEnum recommendation)
        Creates a TNCCS message value containing an access recommendation.
        Parameters:
        recommendation - the access recommendation
        Returns:
        an IETF RFC 5793 compliant TNCCS message value

      • createAssessmentResultValue

        public static PbMessageValueAssessmentResult createAssessmentResultValue(PbMessageAssessmentResultEnum result)
        Creates a TNCCS message value containing a TNCS assessment result.
        Parameters:
        result - the assessment result
        Returns:
        an IETF RFC 5793 compliant TNCCS message value

      • createErrorValueWithOffset

        public static PbMessageValueError createErrorValueWithOffset(PbMessageErrorFlagsEnum[] errorFlags,
                                             int errorCode,
                                             long offset)
        Creates a TNCCS message error value containing information where the error occurred in another message.
        Parameters:
        errorFlags - the flags to set for the error
        errorCode - the code describing the error
        offset - the offset from the message beginning to the erroneous value
        Returns:
        an IETF RFC 5793 compliant TNCCS message value

      • createErrorValueWithVersion

        public static PbMessageValueError createErrorValueWithVersion(PbMessageErrorFlagsEnum[] errorFlags,
                                              short badVersion,
                                              short maxVersion,
                                              short minVersion)
        Creates a TNCCS message error value containing information about the supported version.
        Parameters:
        errorFlags - the flags to set for the error
        badVersion - the unsupported version
        maxVersion - the maximum supported version
        minVersion - the minimum supported version
        Returns:
        an IETF RFC 5793 compliant TNCCS message value

      • createErrorValueSimple

        public static PbMessageValueError createErrorValueSimple(PbMessageErrorFlagsEnum[] errorFlags,
                                         int errorCode)
        Creates a TNCCS message error value containing a simple error.
        Parameters:
        errorFlags - the flags to set for the error
        errorCode - the code describing the error
        Returns:
        an IETF RFC 5793 compliant TNCCS message value

      • createLanguagePreferenceValue

        public static PbMessageValueLanguagePreference createLanguagePreferenceValue(String preferredLanguage)
        Creates a TNCCS message value suggesting a preferred language for human readable strings.
        Parameters:
        preferredLanguage - the RFC 3282 preferred language
        Returns:
        an IETF RFC 5793 compliant TNCCS message value

      • createExperimentalValue

        public static PbMessageValueExperimental createExperimentalValue(String content)
        Creates a TNCCS message value with an experimental value.
        Parameters:
        content - the value content
        Returns:
        an IETF RFC 5793 compliant TNCCS message value

      • createReasonStringValue

        public static PbMessageValueReasonString createReasonStringValue(String reasonString,
                                                 String langCode)
        Creates a TNCCS message value with a string describing a reason for an assessment result and access recommendation in the given language.
        Parameters:
        reasonString - the reason string
        langCode - the RFC 4646 language code
        Returns:
        an IETF RFC 5793 compliant TNCCS message value

      • createRemediationParameterString

        public static PbMessageValueRemediationParameters createRemediationParameterString(String remediationString,
                                                                   String langCode)
        Creates a TNCCS message value with a remediation string in a given language.
        Parameters:
        remediationString - the remediation string
        langCode - the RFC 4646 language code
        Returns:
        an IETF RFC 5793 compliant TNCCS message value

      • createRemediationParameterUri

        public static PbMessageValueRemediationParameters createRemediationParameterUri(String uri)
        Creates a TNCCS message value with a remediation URI for further information/actions.
        Parameters:
        uri - the remediation URI
        Returns:
        an IETF RFC 5793 compliant TNCCS message value

      • createRemediationParameter

        private static PbMessageValueRemediationParameters createRemediationParameter(long rpVendorId,
                                                             long rpType,
                                                             AbstractPbMessageValueRemediationParameter parameter)
        Creates a TNCCS message value with a remediation parameter.
        Parameters:
        rpVendorId - the vendor ID of the remediation string
        rpType - the type of the remediation string
        parameter - the remediation parameter
        Returns:
        an IETF RFC 5793 compliant TNCCS message value

      • createError

        private static PbMessageValueError createError(PbMessageErrorFlagsEnum[] flags,
                              long errorVendorId,
                              int errorCode,
                              AbstractPbMessageValueErrorParameter errorParameter)
        Create a TNCCS message error values with an error parameter.
        Parameters:
        flags - the flags to set for the error
        errorVendorId - the vendor ID of the error
        errorCode - the code describing the error
        errorParameter - the error parameter
        Returns:
        an IETF RFC 5793 compliant TNCCS message value
